item.description: Europeans in Boston gather on the roof of the Splash Lounge (Or downstairs if weather is unsuitable). The group is lively and welcoming to newcomers.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my pic; EIBs are usually in the front, by the bar, not in the cabanas; please come over and say hello.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Hob Nob with Europeans in Boston group CHANGE OF DATE
